content.rendered: Customer Service Representative Bixby area business currently seeking qualified candidates for Customer Service position. Located in the heart of South Tulsa, this position would be within a call center environment conducting moderate to high volume, inbound/outbound calls. Employer fulfills shipping from online auction sites. This is an excellent opportunity for those looking to start a career in customer service or sales! Work schedule would fluctuate, working mostly 11:30am-8pm, occasionally working on Saturday but never on Sunday. Compensation begins around $12/hr with a potential for bonus, medical benefits provided, 401k and more.
